name: acoustic pulverizers
description: A set of sound emitters on each palm.  When provided with bionic power, you can use them to blast holes in solid surfaces.  Wub-wub-wub.

name: basin
description: A wide, shallow basin used to hold liquid, hammered from a piece of sheet metal.  Ideal for collecting water, and because other things can be put inside it while it's empty to conserve space, it doesn't take up much room.

name: vehicle refrigerator
description: A household refrigerator with impressive capacity.  Its power connection has been refurbished to run off of a vehicle battery.

name: vehicle freezer
description: This refurbished refrigerator has been stripped of many of its internal components and converted to run at a much lower temperature, causing it to serve as a freezer at the cost of more power.  Like its predecessor, it runs on vehicle batteries.

name: rolling pin
description: A light wooden rolling pin used to flatten dough.

name: scrap titanium
description: A piece of light titanium, usable for crafting or repairs.

name: ultralight frame
description: A sturdy, lightweight frame made from titanium.  Useful for crafting.

name: MetalMaster forge buddy
description: From the makers of the best-selling* FOODCO kitchen buddy comes the MetalMaster forge buddy, for all your metalworking, firing, and welding needs!  It's just as clunky and awkward as the thing it's based on, and still requires a vehicle battery to function.

name: KitchenMaster cooking buddy
description: Because it *clearly* needed one, this large all-in-one station provides the functions of FOODCO's kitchen buddy, now with complementary fume hoods and chemistry materials.  Why a chef would need a chemical rig is anyone's guess, but you can mount it on a vehicle to make use of it.

name: cooking rig
description: Skillet, pot, hotplate, and chemistry set; everything you need to cook food and chemicals.  Includes proper fume vents and a separator, so you don't contaminate your food with toxic chemicals.

name: large storage battery
description: A huge lithium ion storage battery, easily weighing 600 pounds.  Holds a tremendous amount of energy.
